name: Lemon Tree (Megadroid12)
description:
You were out camping when suddenly a giant meteor hit you camping grounds and mysterious orb and aliens appeared and taken the shape of the mysterious orb

your mission is to collect all of the right orbs and not collect the enemy orbs

simple right? well goodluck.

credits:Dannah
